participant_1.background:
I'm a night owl who prefers to sleep in and do my creative work at night.
my favorite food is cheeseburgers.
I hope that my comics will be published and that people will enjoy them.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
I love waking up to the sound of my dogs' excited barking.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy going to the movies with my friends because we can relax and have fun together.
once a year , i take a week off and head to florida.
i have a cat named george.
my favorite place to spend time at is the beach.
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing good, thanks! I'm just relaxing at home, working on some comics.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love to draw. I'm actually taking a break from writing a story right now.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of story are you writing?
It's about a girl who goes on a quest to find her missing father.
That sounds really cool! I would love to read it when you're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Great! What's your favorite place to spend time at?
My favorite place to spend time at is the beach. I love the sound of the waves and the smell of the ocean.
I love the beach too! I love swimming and playing in the sand.
Me too! I also love watching the sunset over the ocean.
That's so beautiful! I love to take pictures of the sunset.
Me too! I have a whole album of sunset pictures on my phone.
That's awesome! I'll have to see them sometime.
Great! Thanks for talking to me today!
No problem! It was fun talking to you too.
